Package com.palamida.util.io

Static utilities for working with Files, and system-dependent tasks.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    FileProcessor<R>
    A callback interface to be used when processing files.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    FileFilters
    Static utility methods pertaining to FileFilters.
    FileProcessors
    Static utility methods that operate on or return FileProcessors.
    MoreFiles
    Static utility methods for working with Files.
    Systems
    Static utility methods useful for working with system-dependent tasks.

Package com.palamida.util.io Description

Static utilities for working with Files, and system-dependent tasks.
